Uses of Class
org.dellroad.stuff.xml.StreamWriterAction

  • Packages that use StreamWriterAction 
    Package Description
    org.dellroad.stuff.xml
    XML utility classes.

    • Uses of StreamWriterAction in org.dellroad.stuff.xml

      Methods in org.dellroad.stuff.xml that return StreamWriterAction 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static StreamWriterAction StreamWriterAction.of(XMLStreamReader reader)
      Get an instance that corresponds to the current event state of the given XMLStreamReader, such that a sequence of such instances created from consecutive input events will will recreate the input XML.
